title: Buttermilk Drop Biscuits
directions: Mix the dry ingredients: Whisk the flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda and salt together in a large bowl.
Mix the wet ingredients: Stir buttermilk and 6 tbsp melted butter together.
Add the wet ingredients to the dry, stir until just incorporated.
Scoop and drop roughly 9 biscuits onto parchment paper lined pan.
Optionally sprinkle sugar on tops for sweeter biscuits.
